description:
Remote Outpatient Telehealth Opportunities for Psychologists and LCSW's in the state of CA.

Join a leading APA-accredited, clinician-led behavioral health company today! C.H.E. Behavioral Health Services is expanding and seeking compassionate psychologists to join our Tele-Health Team. Today, C.H.E. provides superior behavioral health services and is currently focusing on providing remote telehealth and telemedicine services to a diverse population of adults in the community.

Part-time AND Full-time positions available

C.H.E. offers a variety of part-time and/or full-time options to our clinicians.

  • Medical/Dental benefits
  • 401k with 25% match
  • Paid malpractice policy
  • Free CEU's as CHE is an APA-accredited company
  • Work-Life Balance
  • Flexible Work Schedule


It’s common for psychologists to diversify their work, especially with the changing landscape of today’s mental health. Therefore, CHE’s flexibility part-time and full time options are the perfect complement to your professional and/or personal commitments that offers a steady and consistent income.

Our clinicians have the ability to address a wide range of mental health conditions and are trained on a variety of assessment tools, diagnostic evaluation and treatment interventions.

Pick your own schedule!

Enjoy the freedom to create your own custom schedules with the perfect work/life balance. Provide virtual, live video therapy sessions from the comfort of your own home or office.

Responsibilities

Focus on the patient’s care without the hassle or on-call responsibilities.

Our psychologists focus primarily on patient’s care and our back-office support team handles the rest including billing, collections and credentialing etc... No need for on-call responsibilities and no time spent dealing with insurance companies.

This allows our clinicians time to be spent where it should be; with their patients.

Interested in benefits?

Both full-time and part-time clinicians are eligible to participate for medical health benefits. Please speak with the recruitment team to obtain additional specifics on benefits.

Join the C.H.E Tele-Health Team and make a difference!

Qualifications

Requirements

  • A completed doctorate in clinical psychology, counseling psychology
  • Licensed psychologist


If you are interested or have questions, apply today! Our dedicated recruitment team will reach out to you quickly in order to answer any and all questions to help you determine if C.H.E. is the right “fit” for you.

Job Requirements

  • Active State Licensed Psychologist. Or Masters in Social Work
  • Doctorate in Clinical/Counseling Psychology.
